title: Segfault when pulling keycard out

labels.name: E:Desktop Keycard Bug
labels.description: Bug found after initial keycard development

body:
# Bug Report

## Description

I start the app but the realize my keycard is useless so I pull it out of the reader

## Steps to reproduce

1. Start app
2. Pull keycard before seeing GUI

#### Expected behavior

no crash

#### Actual behavior

crash

### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: 0.13.2
- Operating System: Linux Fedora

```
~/.local/bin                                                                                                                        ⍉
▶ ./StatusIm-Desktop-v0.13.2-8acc0a-x86_64.AppImage
INFO [07-26|14:45:23.914] Status backend initialized               backend=geth version=0.158.1 commit=3ebf67fcd IpfsGatewayURL=https://ipfs.status.im/
Info: Warning: Ignoring XDG_SESSION_TYPE=wayland on Gnome. Use QT_QPA_PLATFORM=wayland to run on Wayland anyway. (:0, )
INF 2023-07-26 14:45:24.813+10:00 Version: 0.13.2                            topics="status-app" tid=28148 file=nim_status_client.nim:182
INF 2023-07-26 14:45:24.813+10:00 Commit: 8acc0a00f                          topics="status-app" tid=28148 file=nim_status_client.nim:183
INF 2023-07-26 14:45:24.814+10:00 Current date:                              topics="status-app" tid=28148 file=nim_status_client.nim:184 currentDateTime=2023-07-26T14:45:24+10:00
INF 2023-07-26 14:45:24.814+10:00 starting application controller...         topics="status-app" tid=28148 file=nim_status_client.nim:186
keycard - listing readers
keycard - waiting for card
keycard - card found at index 0
keycard - using reader ACS ACR39U ICC Reader 00 00
keycard - card protocol T1
[1]    28148 segmentation fault (core dumped)  ./StatusIm-Desktop-v0.13.2-8acc0a-x86_64.AppImage
```
